arts.ttl: Celtic debrief plus Rangers and Hearts Euro previews
arts.sum: Jonathan Sutherland is joined by Asim Rabbani, Mark Atkinson and John Walker

arts.ttl: Neil Critchley reveals Hearts Euro blockbusters sold him on Gorgie vision as he sounds Omonia warning
arts.sum: He's urged his Jambos stars to ensure there are plenty more to look forward to this season

arts.ttl: I got a Hibs boss sacked and and now I want Hearts to be utterly merciless – Ryan Stevenson
arts.sum: It's not nice but it's the nature of football and there's huge stakes on this weekend's Edinburgh Derby in Leith.

arts.ttl: Anniversary of Hibs scudding Hearts reminds me of something sorely lacking from this side – Tam McManus
arts.sum: All Edinburgh derbies are huge but Sunday's already carries extra significance.
